personalInfo.name: Ajith Kumar
personalInfo.title: Software Developer
personalInfo.description: Software developer with 6 years of experience, passionate about building innovative solutions. I enjoy exploring new technologies and optimizing backend systems.

projects.title: Tigers vs Goats
projects.description: A digital adaptation of a popular Indian board game, built as a college project. The app gained over 200,000 downloads on the Play Store and generated around $1,000 in ad revenue before being removed due to lack of maintenance.

projects.title: Project Swarm
projects.description: A strategy puzzle game with multiple levels. While not as successful as Tigers vs Goats, it was an interesting technical challenge. Unfortunately, the project was lost over time.

projects.title: Vir - The Board Game
projects.description: A web-based multiplayer board game with local and online play. Developed for a client who wanted a digital version of their upcoming physical board game. The project was eventually taken down when the physical version didnâ€™t launch.

projects.title: Local Music Bot
projects.description: A Discord bot built using discord.js to stream music from a local server to a voice channel. Created as a solution after popular music bots were banned, allowing my friends and me to continue enjoying music while gaming.

projects.title: Bulk Clip Trimmer
projects.description: A tool for quickly processing large numbers of video clips with minimal effort. Built to address the challenge of managing gaming clips, this project also served as a learning experience in using GPT-4o with Copilot for Flutter development.
